title: Problem Uninstalling in Environment after `spack diy`
body:
I installed a package using `spack diy` inside an environment.  I was later not able to uninstall it.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
citibeth$ alias spack
alias spack='spack -e otp-dev-mac'
citibeth$ spack diy py-mysql-connector@8.0.13
==> diffutils is already installed in /Users/citibob/spack/otp/opt/spack/darwin-highsierra-x86_64/clang-9.0.0-apple/diffutils-3.6-ary2ee3sxnj7qswobjg35f2mfeilkovp
...
Copying lib/mysql_connector_python.egg-info to /Users/citibob/spack/otp/opt/spack/darwin-highsierra-x86_64/clang-9.0.0-apple/py-mysql-connector-8.0.13-z6xyx7gzyyf27pve32r67zemhvq754g4/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mysql_connector_python-8.0.13-py3.6.egg-info
running install_scripts
==> Successfully installed py-mysql-connector
  Fetch: 0.00s.  Build: 3.61s.  Total: 3.61s.
[+] /Users/citibob/spack/otp/opt/spack/darwin-highsierra-x86_64/clang-9.0.0-apple/py-mysql-connector-8.0.13-z6xyx7gzyyf27pve32r67zemhvq754g4

citibeth$ spack uninstall py-mysql-connector@8.0.13
==> Error: py-mysql-connector@8.0.13 does not match any packages in environment 'otp-dev-mac'.
citibeth$ spack diy py-mysql-connector@8.0.13
==> Error: Already installed in /Users/citibob/spack/otp/opt/spack/darwin-highsierra-x86_64/clang-9.0.0-apple/py-mysql-connector-8.0.13-z6xyx7gzyyf27pve32r67zemhvq754g4
==> Uninstall or try adding a version suffix for this DIY build.
citibeth$ spack uninstall py-mysql-connector
==> Error: py-mysql-connector does not match any packages in environment 'otp-dev-mac'.
citibeth$ spack spec -Il py-mysql-connector
Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   py-mysql-connector

Concretized
--------------------------------
[+]  z6xyx7g  py-mysql-connector@8.0.13%clang@9.0.0-apple arch=darwin-highsierra-x86_64 
[+]  qzk5mjg      ^py-protobuf@3.6.1%clang@9.0.0-apple~cpp arch=darwin-highsierra-x86_64 
[+]  oqvxqr5          ^py-setuptools@40.4.3%clang@9.0.0-apple arch=darwin-highsierra-x86_64 
[+]  2hxxfsk              ^python@3.6.5%clang@9.0.0-apple+dbm~optimizations patches=123082ab3483ded78e86d7c809e98a804b3465b4683c96bd79a2fd799f572244 +pic+pythoncmd~shared~tk~ucs4 arch=darwin-highsierra-x86_64 
[+]  vfmdedx                  ^bzip2@1.0.6%clang@9.0.0-apple+shared arch=darwin-highsierra-x86_64 
[+]  ary2ee3                      ^diffutils@3.6%clang@9.0.0-apple arch=darwin-highsierra-x86_64 
[+]  cltxmgh                  ^gdbm@1.18.1%clang@9.0.0-apple arch=darwin-highsierra-x86_64 
[+]  agrquda                      ^readline@7.0%clang@9.0.0-apple arch=darwin-highsierra-x86_64 
[+]  gplqkoi                          ^ncurses@6.1%clang@9.0.0-apple~symlinks~termlib arch=darwin-highsierra-x86_64 
[+]  i5tpatc                              ^pkgconf@1.5.4%clang@9.0.0-apple arch=darwin-highsierra-x86_64 
[+]  kedy4wi                  ^openssl@1.1.1%clang@9.0.0-apple+systemcerts arch=darwin-highsierra-x86_64 
[+]  pqnz5bp                      ^perl@5.26.2%clang@9.0.0-apple+cpanm patches=0eac10ed90aeb0459ad8851f88081d439a4e41978e586ec743069e8b059370ac +shared+threads arch=darwin-highsierra-x86_64 
[+]  t74siw3                      ^zlib@1.2.11%clang@9.0.0-apple+optimize+pic+shared arch=darwin-highsierra-x86_64 
[+]  bf2jtl6                  ^sqlite@3.26.0%clang@9.0.0-apple~functions arch=darwin-highsierra-x86_64 

citibeth$ 
```

However, I was able to uninstall from outside the environment:

```
$ \spack uninstall py-mysql-connector
==> The following packages will be uninstalled:

    -- darwin-highsierra-x86_64 / clang@9.0.0-apple -----------------
    z6xyx7g py-mysql-connector@8.0.13%clang
==> Do you want to proceed? [y/N] y
==> Successfully uninstalled py-mysql-connector@8.0.13%clang@9.0.0-apple arch=darwin-highsierra-x86_64 /z6xyx7g
```

### Information on your system

This includes:

1. macOS
